Reviews.Title: Not Super Resolution
Reviews.Author: Unknown
Reviews.Content: The camera works ok but it is far from super resolution. I guess compared to some of their other older model cameras these could be considered better resolution but the are definitely not super resolution. The video image doesn't come anywhere near what they advertise.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Camera
Reviews.Author: hawgwildterry
Reviews.Content: Had a camera go dead on me and this was an excellent replacement.  It has only BNC connections and not DIN.
